TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WindowsImpersonationContext extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 表示模擬作業前的 Windows 使用者。

span.span: Represents the Windows user prior to an impersonation operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者會模擬另一位使用者之後，這個類別就會還原使用者的身分識別。This class reverts a user's identity after the user impersonates another user. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此類型會實作介面。This type implements the interface. 當您完成使用型別時，您應該處置它直接或間接。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接處置型別，呼叫其方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要處置它間接，使用的語言建構這類`using`（在 C# 中) 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 「 使用物件，實作 IDisposable 」 一節介面 > 主題。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何模擬使用者，然後還原成原始身分識別。The following example demonstrates how to impersonate a user and then revert to the original identity. [!code-cpp[WindowsIdentity Impersonation#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/WindowsIdentity Impersonation/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WindowsIdentity Impersonation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/WindowsIdentity Impersonation/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WindowsIdentity Impersonation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/WindowsIdentity Impersonation/VB/source.vb#1)]

para.span: Microsoft Windows 98 和 Windows Millennium Edition 平台沒有使用者或使用者權杖，因為模擬能在這些平台上的位置。

span.span: Because Microsoft Windows 98 and Windows Millennium Edition platforms do not have users or user tokens, impersonation cannot take place on those platforms.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的所有資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的所有資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 之後呼叫，您必須釋放所有的參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體，所佔用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 清除 Unmanaged 資源向上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`具有`disposing`設定為`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 當`disposing`參數為 true 時，這個方法由任何 managed 物件持有的資源全部釋出這個參考。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 當覆寫小心不要參考先前處置好的呼叫中的物件。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱 <<c2> [ 實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需詳細資訊並，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源總](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

summary.span: 將目前執行個體所持有的資源釋出。

span.span: Releases the resources held by the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 這個成員會在.NET Framework 2.0 版及後續版本中移除。This member is removed in the .NET Framework version 2.0 and subsequent versions. 應用程式程式碼不會呼叫這個方法。它會自動叫用記憶體回收期間，除非已停用記憶體回收行程的最終處理。Application code does not call this method; it is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 與 。For more information, see and . 這個方法會覆寫 。This method overrides .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Undo() cil managed

summary.span: 將使用者內容還原成由這個物件表示的 Windows 使用者。

span.span: Reverts the user context to the Windows user represented by this object.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範如何模擬使用指定的使用者權杖的 Windows 身分識別。The following example shows how to impersonate a Windows identity using a specified user token. [!code-cpp[Classic WindowsImpersonationContext.Undo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic WindowsImpersonationContext.Undo Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WindowsImpersonationContext.Undo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic WindowsImpersonationContext.Undo Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WindowsImpersonationContext.Undo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic WindowsImpersonationContext.Undo Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 為了將識別還原成本身以外的其他因素而嘗試使用這個方法。

span.span: An attempt is made to use this method for any purpose other than to revert identity to self.

para.span: Microsoft Windows 98 和 Windows Millennium Edition 平台沒有使用者或使用者權杖，因為模擬能在這些平台上的位置。

span.span: Because Microsoft Windows 98 and Windows Millennium Edition platforms do not have users or user tokens, impersonation cannot take place on those platforms.
